data.message: How can I stop Facebook from controlling my news feed? Top stories and recent stories are pretty much the same... Just because someone just commented on an old feed doesn't make it recent. 😡😡😡Ihate seeing some of the same stories over and over another day😡want to see my friend's posts posted in real time so I can stay in touch better..

replies.message: Hey Taylor. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1rmVirO -Hailey
